screen.damageful.config.enabled.tooltip: If true, the mod will work
screen.damageful.config.show_percentage_: If, true, the damage will be displayed as percentages
screen.damageful.config.show_self_damage: If true, the damage done to you will be displayed
screen.damageful.config.max_distance.too: Responsible for the distance to the mob from which the mod will start working
screen.damageful.config.velocity_multipl: The velocity of the particles will be accelerated by this value
screen.damageful.config.gravity_strength: Responsible for the gravitational force of particles
screen.damageful.config.random_velocity_: If true, the particles will have a random velocity in the velocity range
screen.damageful.config.offset.tooltip: Indentation by which the particles will be displaced when spawned
screen.damageful.config.draw_shadow.tool: If true, the particles will be drawn with a shadow near the text
screen.damageful.config.highest_damage_c: Color for damage according to the level of the monster taking the damage
